name: Akio
description:
In a land, distant and forbidden, there is a samurai called Akio. He has to regenerate and increase his power. Akio has to restore 7 abilities in order to retrieve his abilities and fight his evil forces.
Now, you are in charge of fulfilling his mission.

*Please press R to respawn if you're stuck*
*The powerup in the most right part of the cave is for double jump, forgot to put a sign there *

*MANY BUGS ARE YET TO BE FIXED*

Kindly thanks to:
